content: somewhere on the mountain beanie yarn bulky #5 hook k - 6 5mm gauge 11dc x 6 row = 4 x4 stitches v stitch 1dc ch1 1dc in same space fpdc step 1 yo on hook step 2 insert hook into hole next to the post of the next stitch on the hook side step 3 bring the hook back to the front of the fabric from behind the post to the hole farther from the hook step 4 yo and draw through a loop bringing it through both sides of the fabric 3 loops remaining on hook step 5 yo and draw through 2 loops on hook 2 loops remaining on hook step 6 yo and draw through remaining 2 loops on hook bpdc step 1 yo on hook step 2 insert hook into hole next to the post of the next stitch on the hook side from back to front step 3 bring the hook back to the back of the fabric around the post to the hole farther from the hook step 4 yo and draw through a loop bringing it through both sides of the fabric 3 loops remaining on hook step 5 yo and draw through 2 loops on hook 2 loops remaining on hook step 6 yo and draw through remaining 2 loops on hook instructions 1 magic_ring or chain 4 & join to make starting ring 2 chain 3 1st double_crochet 9 double_crochet around ring join 10dc 3 chain 3 1st double_crochet 1dc in same st *2dc in next stitch repeat join at beg of round 20dc 4 chain 3 1st double_crochet 1dc in same st *2dc in next stitch repeat join at beg of round 40dc 5 chain 4 1st double_crochet + ch1 1dc in same st *skip next st double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next st* repeat join at beg of round 20 v clusters 6 slip_stitch in chain 1sp ch4 1st double_crochet + ch1 1 double_crochet in same space *skip next st double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space* repeat join at beg of round 20 v clusters 7 repeat previous step 7 more times 9 row of v clusters 8 slip_stitch in ch1 space ch3 1st double_crochet 2dc in same ch1 space *3dc in next ch1 space* repeat join at beg of round 60dc 9 ch3 1st double_crochet *fpdc around next double_crochet bpdc around next double_crochet* repeat join at beginning of round 10 repeat previous step 9 11 ch3 1st double_crochet *fpdc around next double_crochet bpdc around next double_crochet* repeat 2 times decrease over next 2 stitches repeat between until end join with beginning fasten_off optional pom pom on top
